feed.title: HortusFox Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v4.6
entry.content:
Version 4.6 of HortusFox

This is a hotfix release: It selfhosts FontAwesome free which is required in order to not fall into rate limiting. Selfhosting the icons is the approbriate way for a selfhosted application.

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v4.7
entry.content:
Version 4.7 of HortusFox

This hotfix update completes the recent migration from FontAwesome CDN to FontAwesome Free Selfhosted version.

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v4.8
entry.content:
Version 4.8 of HortusFox

Changelog:

  • Improve looks of e-mails (#373)
  • Bulk move plants to different locations (#370)
  • Fixed AquaShell launcher script
  • Updated french language
  • Proper error handling of OpenWeatherMap responses
  • Fixed FontAwesome icon reference

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v4.9
entry.content:
Version 4.9 of HortusFox

This hotfix release fixes issue #343

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v5.0
entry.content:
Version 5.0 of HortusFox

Changelog:

  • New language: Brazilien portuguese (#379)
  • Allow removal of task items (#385)
  • Add region on duplicate localization names (#387)
  • Fixed breaking of weather page and dashboard upon newly activated OWM keys (#390)
  • Variable to auto-update composer dependencies on docker app container start (#391)
  • More selectable values for light level attribute (#388)
  • API endpoints for backups and imports (#392)
  • Allow users to select a gallery photo as main photo (#382)
  • Toggable Add-Plant widget (#389)
  • Improved localization contribution guide (#380)
